mapper.select: SELECT chat.*, users.name AS username_name, receiver_users.name AS sendname_name, udetails.image AS username_img, sdetails.image AS sendname_img FROM chat JOIN users ON chat.username = users.username JOIN users receiver_users ON chat.sendname = receiver_users.username JOIN userdetails udetails ON chat.username = udetails.username JOIN userdetails sdetails ON chat.sendname = sdetails.username WHERE chat.username = #{username}
